text: Waldenburg District is one of the five districts in the canton of Basel- Landschaft, Switzerland. The capital is Waldenburg. As of 31 March 2017, 16,091 people lived there. The district has 15 municipalities: * Arboldswil * Bennwil * Bretzwil * Diegten * Eptingen * HÃ¶lstein * Lampenberg * Langenbruck * Lauwil * Liedertswil * Niederdorf * Oberdorf * Reigoldswil * Titterten * Waldenburg Category:Waldenburg District
title: Waldenburg District
